plot: This cartoon deals with three kittens who are cruel and mean to an orphan kitty, but the mother cat adopts the little orphan, serves pie to all four kittens and all is well at the cat-house.
title: Kittens' Mittens
plot_es: This cartoon deals with three kittens who are cruel and mean to an orphan kitty, but the mother cat adopts the little orphan, serves pie to all four kittens and all is well at the cat-house.
plot_en: This cartoon deals with three kittens who are cruel and mean to an orphan kitty, but the mother cat adopts the little orphan, serves pie to all four kittens and all is well at the cat-house.
